properties.name: detour13
properties.description: Detour #13: Marathon (mile 26) and Half Marathon (mile 12): west side of Lake Merrit and Uptown From 9:15am to 2:15pm: South of 19th Street: Take 17th St., right on Madison, right on 14th St., left on Webster, right on 12th, cross Broadway, right on Castro to I-980 westbound toward I-880 southbound. Or to get to I-880 southbound, turn left on Broadway, follow signs to I-880 southbound. From 8:00am â€“ 3:00pm: North of 19th Street: Head up Franklin, right on 21st, left on Harrison, left on West Grand, right on Broadway, left on 23rd, left on Martin Luther King, right on West Grand, left on Brush to I-980. Either continue straight onto I-980 westbound toward I- 880 southbound (on-ramp entrance at 16th Street) Or take a left on 17th, left on Castro to I-980 eastbound toward Highway 24 and I-580. Of special note: This route not available at very beginning of the race from 7am to 8am until the marathon runners clear Broadway. After 3:00pm: Runners will have cleared area; streets will be reopened to normal traffic.
